messageBody:
>So said rahuls_25 on 2003-08-07 --------------------
>Hi,
>I am a newbie to JUnit and my company uses automatic build to run
>test cases written in Junit for each java class. But, we are not
>testing EJBs currently as it would involve creating .ear file and
>testing. So, can anybody tell me what is the best way to test Entity,
>session and message beans and servlets? Is there anyway to test JSPs?
>Any samples/links provided will be much appreciated.

My coauthor and I will devote approximately 100 pages to this in our upcoming book. Please understand that we can't do it by tomorrow. :)

Since you are testing code already written, my strong suggestion is to start by testing through the end-user interface or using a package like Cactus. Thorough and fast testing of EJBs requires a certain design approach that not many people take.

Take care.
